dex-mobile-database.description: Database credentials for DEX Mobile PostgreSQL

dex-mobile-redis.description: Redis credentials for DEX Mobile ElastiCache

dex-mobile-idfy.description: IDfy API credentials for KYC verification

dex-mobile-signzy.description: Signzy API credentials for AML screening

dex-mobile-coingecko.description: CoinGecko API credentials for chart data

dex-mobile-blockchain-rpcs.description: Blockchain RPC endpoints for DEX Mobile

dex-mobile-encryption.description: Encryption keys for DEX Mobile application

dex-mobile-payment-gateways.description: Payment gateway credentials for fiat operations

dex-mobile-database-staging.description: Staging database credentials for DEX Mobile PostgreSQL

dex-mobile-idfy-staging.description: IDfy sandbox credentials for staging KYC verification

dex-mobile-blockchain-rpcs-staging.description: Testnet RPC endpoints for staging blockchain service

production: aws secretsmanager create-secret --name 'dex-mobile-database' --description 'Database credentials for DEX Mobile PostgreSQL' --secret-string '{"username":"postgres","password":"REPLACE_WITH_SECURE_PASSWORD"}'
aws secretsmanager create-secret --name 'dex-mobile-redis' --description 'Redis credentials for DEX Mobile ElastiCache' --secret-string '{"password":"REPLACE_WITH_SECURE_REDIS_PASSWORD"}'

aws secretsmanager create-secret --name 'dex-mobile-supabase' --description 'Supabase credentials for DEX Mobile' --secret-string '{"url":"https://your-project-id.supabase.co","service_role_key":"REPLACE_WITH_SUPABASE_SERVICE_ROLE_KEY"}'

aws secretsmanager create-secret --name 'dex-mobile-idfy' --description 'IDfy API credentials for KYC verification' --secret-string '{"api_key":"REPLACE_WITH_IDFY_API_KEY","account_id":"REPLACE_WITH_IDFY_ACCOUNT_ID"}'
aws secretsmanager create-secret --name 'dex-mobile-signzy' --description 'Signzy API credentials for AML screening' --secret-string '{"api_key":"REPLACE_WITH_SIGNZY_API_KEY"}'
aws secretsmanager create-secret --name 'dex-mobile-coingecko' --description 'CoinGecko API credentials for chart data' --secret-string '{"api_key":"REPLACE_WITH_COINGECKO_API_KEY"}'

aws secretsmanager create-secret --name 'dex-mobile-blockchain-rpcs' --description 'Blockchain RPC endpoints for DEX Mobile' --secret-string '{"ethereum_rpc_url":"https://mainnet.infura.io/v3/YOUR_PROJECT_ID","polygon_rpc_url":"https://polygon-mainnet.infura.io/v3/YOUR_PROJECT_ID"}'

aws secretsmanager create-secret --name 'dex-mobile-encryption' --description 'Encryption keys for DEX Mobile application' --secret-string '{"encryption_key":"REPLACE_WITH_32_CHARACTER_ENCRYPTION_KEY","jwt_secret":"REPLACE_WITH_JWT_SECRET_KEY"}'

aws secretsmanager create-secret --name 'dex-mobile-monitoring' --description 'Monitoring and observability credentials' --secret-string '{"grafana_admin_password":"REPLACE_WITH_SECURE_GRAFANA_PASSWORD"}'
aws secretsmanager create-secret --name 'dex-mobile-github' --description 'GitHub integration credentials for CI/CD' --secret-string '{"github_token":"REPLACE_WITH_GITHUB_PERSONAL_ACCESS_TOKEN"}'

aws secretsmanager create-secret --name 'dex-mobile-payment-gateways' --description 'Payment gateway credentials for fiat operations' --secret-string '{"paypal_client_id":"REPLACE_WITH_PAYPAL_CLIENT_ID","paypal_client_secret":"REPLACE_WITH_PAYPAL_CLIENT_SECRET"}'

aws secretsmanager create-secret --name 'dex-mobile-analytics' --description 'Analytics and tracking service credentials' --secret-string '{"google_analytics_id":"UA-XXXXXXXX-1","mixpanel_token":"REPLACE_WITH_MIXPANEL_TOKEN"}'

usage_instructions.step_1: Replace all 'REPLACE_WITH_*' placeholders with actual values
usage_instructions.step_2: Use the AWS CLI commands in 'secret_creation_commands' to create secrets
usage_instructions.step_3: Update CloudFormation templates to reference these secret ARNs
usage_instructions.step_4: Configure applications to retrieve secrets using AWS SDK
usage_instructions.step_5: Set up IAM roles with appropriate secretsmanager:GetSecretValue permissions
usage_instructions.step_6: Enable automatic rotation for database and API key secrets where supported

security_best_practices.encryption: All secrets are encrypted using AWS KMS customer-managed keys
security_best_practices.access_control: Use IAM roles and policies to restrict access to secrets
security_best_practices.rotation: Enable automatic rotation for supported secret types
security_best_practices.monitoring: Enable CloudTrail logging for secret access
security_best_practices.least_privilege: Grant minimum required permissions to access secrets
security_best_practices.environment_separation: Use separate secrets for different environments
